articles.title: Bay Mourns Pioneering Female Astronaut, an Annapolis Rower - Chesapeake Bay Magazine
articles.description: A pioneering female astronaut who has lived and spent time around the waters of Annapolis has passed away at the age of 76. Dr. Mary Louis Cleave was a NASA astronaut and veteran of two spaceflights…
